long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides the ability to refresh any page at a set interval of time. Simply click on the extension to turn the refresh On/Off.

You can also navigate to some different tabs, your Timely-Active tab (tab where the extension was turned On) will keep on refreshing, letting you continue your other works.
